product_name: La Sportiva Wildcat 2.0 GTX Trail-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: Waterproof and well-cushioned, the La Sportiva Wildcat 2.0 GTX trail-running shoes offer a stable, neutral ride for fast-paced trail pursuits. 1-piece nylon air mesh uppers are highly breathable and lightweight; polyurethane reinforcements provide support for heels. Stretchy Gore-Tex(R) XCR(R) waterproof liners supply a great fit and let feet breathe while protecting them from the elements, keeping them dry and comfortable. 1-piece lacing harness supplies a secure, snug and supportive fit; nylon mesh linings on tongues and heels wick moisture to help keep feet dry. EVA midsoles featuring 2.4mm LaSpEVA extra layer for added shock absorption provide ample cushioning and help reduce and dissipate impact forces. Molded nylon shanks modulate toe spring and offer additional stability. Sticky rubber outsoles on the La Sportiva Wildcat 2.0 GTX shoes feature the Impact Brake System(TM) to reduce impact forces and improve traction with a special lug pattern.
short_description: Waterproof and well-cushioned, the La Sportiva Wildcat 2.0 GTX trail-running shoes offer a stable, neutral ride for fast-paced trail pursuits.
